functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Multishot Crossbow\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A steady crossbow, favourite of the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"exiles when they revolted in Ixinik.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 9","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Piercing","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Up to 16 arrows returned on death","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Multishot","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:7,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:piercing",lvl:127},{id:"minecraft:multishot",lvl:1}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUIDLeast:994685,UUIDMost:-467856,Slot:"mainhand"}]}
